data.name: Bai Qu: Hundreds of Melodies
data.detailed_description:
Synopsis

Location is the ancient capital city Nanjing, China. And time is when spring turns into summer.

While visiting his sick father, college student Wei Qiuwu accidentally encountered a concertina playing little girl in the hospital.
An inharmonious pair, seemingly. But soon, Wei Qiuwu became a good friend of Li Jiayun, the little player. And both of them act as an indispensable tune in each other's life.
With the accompaniment of sedate Nurse Yang Qin and cheerful high school student He Jia, the story surrounding Li Jiayun is about to begin...

After they get familiar with each other, He Jia guides Wei Qiuwu and Li Jiayun to visit a lot of interesting places, acquaint with a variety of people and encounter with a diversity of things.
They become an inseparable trio as well as good friends, everything looks blissful. Until one day, Yang Qin unveiled to Wei Qiuwu the cruel truth under a fairy-tale cover...

Key Features

  • The official sequel of Shan Gui.
  • A storyline of 8 to 12 hours, with multiple routes and endings.
  • There is no absolute "right choice", different endings contain different meaning.
  • An unordinary story, themed with love and caring in ordinary daily life.
  • A modern story happened in an ancient country.
  • Full-voiced main characters.
  • Delicate and realistic background pictures, field recorded ambient sound to make you feel you were in the scene.
  • Over 20 wonderful background music tracks, which include varieties of music genres.
  • 2560×1440 resolution for game and 4096×2304 for CGs.
data.about_the_game:
Synopsis

Location is the ancient capital city Nanjing, China. And time is when spring turns into summer.

While visiting his sick father, college student Wei Qiuwu accidentally encountered a concertina playing little girl in the hospital.

After they get familiar with each other, He Jia guides Wei Qiuwu and Li Jiayun to visit a lot of interesting places, acquaint with a variety of people and encounter with a diversity of things.
They become an inseparable trio as well as good friends, everything looks blissful. Until one day, Yang Qin unveiled to Wei Qiuwu the cruel truth under a fairy-tale cover...

Key Features

  • 2560×1440 resolution for game and 4096×2304 for CGs.
data.short_description: A melody of life and death surrounding a sickly girl and her friends.
data.supported_languages:
English, Simplified Chinese*, Traditional Chinese, Japanese, Russian, Spanish - Spain, French
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7+
  • Processor: 2.0 Ghz 64-bit Intel-compatible
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 3.0 / DirectX 11
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: macOS 10.10+
  • Processor: 2.0 Ghz 64-bit Intel-compatible
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 3.0
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Apple silicon supported through Rosetta 2
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Ubuntu 16.04+
  • Processor: 2.0 Ghz 64-bit Intel-compatible
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 3.0
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
